description: A high-quality audio experience, consistently balanced at any volume, thanks to Bose active EQ Wireless convenience, with easy Bluetooth and NFC pairing aided by voice prompts Exclusive stay hear plus tips keep the headphones comfortably in place during workouts Up to 6 hours battery life per charge Troubleshooting steps: Unpair your headphones from your device, and then pair them again. Sometimes refreshing the connection can help certain issue
